description:
At the end of this course, you'll be able to create PROFESSIONAL looking graphics for your home business... and resell them if you wish, just like a professional logo designer. You'll quickly become the master of creating images for your own home business that'll make your customers love sticking around your site.

I've included the FULL Mac and Windows versions of the software with this course. Using The Logo Creator software you'll learn some inside tricks for creating:

  • Page headers with 'images inside of text' (make the word "wood" look like wood!)
  • Logos (how to select one of the 200 templates and modify it a gazillion ways and resell each of them)
  • How to bring traffic to your home business using Pinterest and The Logo Creator
  • You'll learn how to create a video for your marketing purposes (using The Logo Creator and an animation tool called "Powtoon")
  • You'll be able to create page headers and really nice looking graphics for your business so your customers will know your site is reputable
  • You'll learn how to create your own meme and you're own eBook (it's easy!) as well as how to use The Logo Creator to create a viral video


Becoming a logo designer with this software is easy because it's template-based. Just drag and click images and text. These tips and tricks (and the FREE software provided) will get you looking professional ...and profitable (especially if you want to SELL what you create).
title: Become a Logo Designer: Guide to Complimentary Logo Software
